original_text: His father had never at any time displeased him by asking, “Why have you done thus and so?” He was also a very handsome man, and he was born next after Absalom.
korean_text: 그는 압살롬 다음에 태어난 자요 용모가 심히 준수한 자라 그의 아버지가 네가 어찌하여 그리 하였느냐고 하는 말로 한 번도 그를 섭섭하게 한 일이 없었더라

sentences.original_text: His father had never at any time displeased him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지는 일찍이 그를 괴롭게 한 적이 없었으니

sentences.original_text: “Why have you done thus and so?”
He was also a very handsome man
he was born next after Absalom.
